channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Youngkin’s ‘Common Sense’ Legacy in Virginia
item.description: Glenn Youngkin’s single term was easily one of the most successful of any governor in recent memory.

item.title: Trump at Year One
item.description: The president has governed at a frenzied pace that has produced some real successes, but he also exceeded his authority to advance harebrained ideas.

item.title: Don Lemon Made Himself Relevant Again, And Now He Should Be In Federal Custody
item.description: The disgraced former CNN host has-been and his thug buddies who terrorized a church should face charges for assaulting civil rights.

item.title: EU chief von der Leyen on Trump: ‘A deal is a deal. And when friends shake hands, it must mean something’
item.description: "We consider the people of the United States not just our allies, but our friends," the European Commission chief said at the World Economic Forum.

item.title: Jerome Powell to attend Supreme Court oral argument on Lisa Cook’s attempted firing from Federal Reserve
item.description: If Trump succeeds in removing Cook, he could appoint another person to fill her slot, which would give his appointees a majority on the Fed's board.

item.title: House Democrat calls Trump 'extremely mentally ill' after Greenland remarks, urges 25th Amendment removal

item.title: Yes, Christians And Pastors Can Work For ICE Enforcing U.S. Immigration Laws
item.description: Christians are free to support completely closed borders, and they are free to help enforce federal immigration laws, including with the use of force.

item.title: Supreme Court declines to hear challenges to ban on felons possessing guns
item.description: The Supreme Court shunted aside several gun-rights cases Tuesday that tested the limits of the federal law that bans felons from possessing firearms.

item.title: Trump endorsement rocks Louisiana Senate race as Letlow poised to jump in
item.description: Trump's endorsement of Rep. Julia Letlow over Sen. Bill Cassidy shakes up Louisiana's GOP Senate race, creating major headaches for Senate leadership.

item.title: California’s looming capital flight problem could reshape state in 3 key areas

item.title: If Your Pastor Values Illegal Immigration More Than Your Right To Worship, Find A New Church
item.description: Christian leaders shouldn't be more concerned about protecting illegal aliens from ICE than protecting the religious freedom of their congregants.

item.title: Forget the four-day workweek: CEO of the world’s largest workspace provider says it’s not coming, despite what Bill Gates and Elon Musk predict
item.description: Billionaire tech CEOs promise shorter weeks thanks to AI—but IWG’s Mark Dixon says automation won’t free time, it’ll just create more work.

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.
